segments.text: The kitchen appears bright with daylight from the open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands at the sink, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's facing away, focused on her drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water begins to spill over the edge slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a sheet down the front, pooling on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her shoes touches the edge of the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinet doors hang open above the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy uses a stool to reach inside for something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate in one hand while grabbing with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the stool tilts dangerously under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl nearby extends her arm toward him expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks serene with its path and plants.
segments.speaker: PAR
